acount_delete_confirm_description: This is a destructive action which cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
account_check_email_description: A link to delete your account has been sent to your email. If you cannot find it, please check the spam folder
dashboard_domain_explanation: These are all the domains you own. You can modify each parameter of them by simply clicking on their respective input field.
dashboard_domain_limit: You have exceeded your domain limit.
dashboard_invalid_value: Please ensure the 'value' field is correct.
login_failed_description: Username and password do not match.
login_failed_verify_description: An email has been sent to your inbox. Please check your spam folder.
login_generic_error: There was an error while logging in. If this continues, please contact support.
signup_password_not_match_description: Please confirm that your passwords match.
api_dashboard_key_warning: Warning! You are about to show your API key.
api_dashboard_key_warning_description: Revealing your API key might result in unauthorized changes to your domain. Do you want to continue?
api_dashboard_key_description: Your API key is "{key}". Do not share this API key under any circumstances.
api_dashboard_key_deletion: Are you sure you want to delete a key with the description "{key_comment}"?
api_dashboard_key_deletion_description: This is a change that cannot be undone. Every app that relies on this API key will instantly stop working. Are you sure you want to continue?
api_dashboard_comment_placeholder: For testing my super cool app
dashboard_domain_use: The requested domain has already been registered!
dashboard_domain_permissions: You must own all parts of the requested domain.
account_recovery_description: Please enter your frii.site username. A verification code will be sent to your email.
account_recovery_success_description: You can now log in using your new password.
account_recovery_sent: A verification email has been sent to your inbox.
account_recovery_sent_description: If you can't find it, please check your spam folder.
account_recovery_start_fail_description: Did you double-check your username? Frii.site usernames are case-sensitive.
blogs_description: Read the latest news about frii.site here!
account_permissions_lack: Looks like you don't have the necessary permissions to do this.
login_description: Please sign into your frii.site account.
api_dashboard_create_fail: Failed to create an API key
api_dashboard_create_fail_domains: You have to own every domain you want the API key to affect. If you think this is a bug, contact us at contact@frii.site.
api_dashboard_create_success_description: You can now use this API key.
code_verif_loading_wrong_desc: This code has either expired, or is invalid.
account_del_desc: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is permanent and cannot be undone. The following actions will happen:
account_del_steps_1: Your account will be permanently deleted
account_del_steps_2: Every domain on your account will also be deleted and become available for other users to register
account_del_steps_3: Your personal information will be erased from our servers
account_del_steps_4: Your account's username will be available for other users to register
account_del_agree: I understand the consequences, and I would like to continue
generic_fail_description: Please contact support if this error persists.
login_mfa_description: Enter the verification code from your authenticator app.
mfa_qr_guide: Scan this QR code in your authenticator app
mfa_backup_warning: Please save these backup codes somewhere safe. If you get locked out, you cannot recover your account without these.
mfa_unable_to_login: Unable to log in? Contact support.
mfa_disable_with_backup: Disable two-factor authentication with a backup code
mfa_recovery: Disable two-factor authentication with a backup key
captcha_fail: Please solve the captcha before continuing
mfa_login_description: Enter your one-time code from your authenticator app
signup_prompt: Sign up for a frii.site account
signup_tos_and_privacy: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
home_selling_point_always_free_descripti: frii.site will always be completely free for anyone to use. Our main goal is to provide free domains to users who are unable to buy their own domains. However, even if you do own a domain, you're welcome to use our service!
api_dashboard_delete_title: Are you sure you would like to delete this key?
api_dashboard_delete_description: Deleting an API key immediately stops all services using this key from having access to your domains. This is a destructive action that cannot be undone.
home_description: A modern, free subdomain service for developers, project managers, and regular people.
home_selling_point_support_description: frii.site supports many popular services, such as Vercel. Most services that simply require a domain are supported, but certain services such as Cloudflare DNS require you to register your own domain.
home_selling_point_independent_descripti: You can register, delete, and modify domains straight from our dashboard. There is no need to use a convoluted CLI or a request form, and you don't have to wait for any domain verification as domain registrations are done immediately.
dashboard_suffix_warn_desc: frii.site automatically adds the ".frii.site" portion of your domain
social_login_conflict: This email has already been linked to an existing account! Please connect your account in settings.
login_fail_signout: Looks like you were signed out
referral_create_fail: Failed to create a referral code
vercel_verification_queue_over: Successfully verified! Please click 'Refresh' on Vercel.
home_selling_point_open_source_descripti: Our frontend and backend are both completely open-source, and open to contributions. Our backend uses FastAPI, MongoDB, and fully-typed Python code, which makes it easy for other developers to quickly jump into our codebase. Our frontend is written in Svelte (with TypeScript).
activation_guide: Please enter your activation code below
activation_fail_desc: The code may have already been used.
dashboard_vercel_hint: Trying to verify a Vercel domain?
account_discord_link_desc: By linking your Discord account to your frii.site account, you can receive login alerts directly through Discord.
account_discord_link_server: Click the link below to join our Discord server
account_discord_link_bot: Next, join our Discord server, and run /link in the #bot-commands channel.
